front.title: •Darth Vader, Dark Lord Of The Sith
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. When in a battle, may target one opponent's character present. Draw destiny. Target 'choked' (lost) if destiny > ability. Immune to attrition < 5.
front.lore: Formerly Anakin Skywalker, Jedi Knight. Became Darth Vader. Ordered by Emperor Palpatine to deal with Luke Skywallker, but bargained for his son's life instead.

combo: Darth Vader, Dark Lord Of The Sith + I Have You Now Add one battle destiny (two if Rebel is Luke) if a Dark Jedi and a Rebel with ability > 2 are involved in the same battle.
Darth Vader, Dark Lord Of The Sith + Force Field Cancels an attempt to target a Dark Jedi with a character weapon.
